resources.string: I want to mention something for people like me reaching this page because of Android Studio.\n In AS when you extract a string using the IDEs tool, it automatically strips newline characters. You can just manually add them back in and it will work fine. \nNot sure why it does this.

Kubalehe ni kipindi cha maisha kinachotokeza mabadiliko ya kimwili na kihisia ili kuwa mtu mzima. Katika kipindi hiki, mwili na homoni zinabadilika kwa kasi ili kukuandaa uwe na uwezo wa kuzaa.
Jambo hilo halimaanishi kwamba unastahili kuwa mzazi. Badala yake, kubalehe ni ishara ya kuachana na utoto na kuwa mtu mzima—jambo linaloweza kufurahisha na wakati uleule kuhuzunisha. 

Kila mtu atapitia kipindi hiki kigumu cha mabadiliko ya kimwili na akili. Usijali hii ni hali ya kawaida tu ambao sisi sote tunapitia ili kuwa watu wazima. 

Balehe huanza katika umri tofauti tofauti kwa kila mmoja. Wengine huanza mapema, baadhi huchelewa kupata mabadiliko haya. Wastani wa umri wa miaka 13 kwa kijana ndo huanza kupitia mabadiliko haya ya balehe.
This is where you\'ll know everything about\n you as a male or female so as to make\n\tbetter life decisions
Why most African tribes don\'t consider family planning and see it as a bad practise?
It is because most of the African societies believe in their own customs and traditions. Others believe that it is against God\'s will and others don\'t even want to talk about it, which is absurd.
